reviewText:
OMG! This is every iKONIC's dream. Ok maybe not the whole dream, but a perfect substitute.

3 Discs in total and the package is huge (Think full sized 8x10 notebook size). Comes with full page color photo book, a folder (? Why, I dunno), A sticker sheet and 2 bonus discs. One disc is Extras from the Concert in Seoul. The second disc is extras and the Bonus disc is the Debut Concert.

Be sure to watch the extras where they will give you a Focus of the idol of your choice! All the Heartu!
